```lisp
['(:action peel
  ; Peel an item and update its status
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (not (peeled ?item)) (has-tool ?agent))
  :effect (and (peeled ?item) (not (outer-layer ?item))))',
  
 '(:action buy
  ; Purchase or prepare a resource and update its status
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?resource - object)
  :precondition (and (not (obtained ?resource)) 
                     (or (has-money ?npc) (has-tool ?npc)))
  :effect (obtained ?resource))']
```
